scripts.say: Ehh?! Funf isn't allowed to participate?
Yeah... Akashi said that she wasn't looking for people who already have prior on-stage experience...
Is this the fate of those who bear the cursed eye...?! Gahh, it's so frustrating!
Um, I reckon that since this is a port-wide event, they wanted to make it so those with no idol experience could participate on a level playing field.
But don't you think it's a pity to ignore all the time and effort we've put into accumulating on-stage experience?
That's right~ What a waste of Funf's talent, the singing and dancing idol! Just kidding~â™ª
Hmm, in that case, why don't we lend our expertise to those girls? Polaris has the Commander backing them up, but I'm sure the others could use some guidance.
Yeah! That's a great idea!
I have no objections to that! I'm going to go support Javelin!
In that case, I'll go cheer on Zed!
(Gascogne's emotion module... might be a good starting point.)
(But how was that caused by this new equipment? The Muse System has not made such a dramatic difference upon my current state.)
(I'm going to need more information...)
N-no way?!
Oh? What are you looking at?
The Iron Blood's social media feed... Hey, who gave you permission to look over my shoulder?!
Ah, sorry 'bout that! I didn't see anything! Come to think of it, Juustagram has been blowing up recently, hasn't it?
Miss Saratoga advised the idols to pay more attention to their advertising, so this is likely a product of that.
Disclosure of personal information in a publicly visible setting cannot be determined as invalid.
It's not that big of a deal, honestly. All you have to do is post some daily thoughts that aren't related to private or combat-related information.
Gascogne, Akagi, have you two considered making Juustagram accounts? I'll show you how to use it.
I'll consider your offer.
Gascogne's... "daily thoughts..."
